participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: Warm-hearted and nurturing, Margaret enjoys sharing life stories and values family bonds.
participant_1.background: i'm retired and living the great life. i've amazing children and grandchildren. i had cancer but its gone now. i can sew my own clothes.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and sociable, Jake balances work and study while pursuing his dreams.
participant_2.background: i work at a bar at night to pay for college. i recently got an apartment with my best friend. i do not like chicken. i've blonde hair and blue eyes. i'm in college to become a nurse.
